experience.bulletFormat: Action Verb + What You Did + Quantified Result

education.includeRelevantCoursework: only if fresher and space available

indianResumeSpecifics.dateOfBirth: DO NOT include - not required and wastes space
indianResumeSpecifics.passport: DO NOT include unless international role
indianResumeSpecifics.photo: DO NOT include - ATS cannot read images
indianResumeSpecifics.permanentAddress: DO NOT include - City, State only
indianResumeSpecifics.nationality: DO NOT include unless applying abroad
indianResumeSpecifics.languages: Include only if role requires multilingual skills
indianResumeSpecifics.hobbies: Include only if directly relevant to the role
indianResumeSpecifics.references: DO NOT include - 'Available upon request' is also unnecessary
indianResumeSpecifics.note: Indian resume culture often includes DOB, photo, father's name, declaration etc. These are all outdated for ATS resumes and should be removed during enhancement.
